title: The One With Two Parts, Part 2

questions.question: What is Rachel's initial reaction when she falls off the balcony and may have broken her foot or ankle?

She starts crying and panicking
She glares at the nurse who thinks she's heard it all before
She tries to stand up and walk it off
questions.correct_answer: She glares at the nurse who thinks she's heard it all before
questions.explanation: Rachel's glare at the nurse shows her initial frustration and pain after falling.
